page.title: 19Economic life of St. Agnes
page.content: St. Agnes has two banks, Barclays and Lloyds, both being sub-branches of their main banks in Perranporth. No Building Society has its own premises, but two operate locally - Bristol & West is combined with the estate agents Miller & Co., and Abbey National is combined with the local solicitors. All are in Vicarage Road. The rates, controlled by the Carrick District Council, increase each year. The price of property has escalated in recent years due to the attractive area and the nearness to the sea. It is now one of the most expensive areas in the county for buying property. The two estate agents in the main street carry a wide selection of property, ranging from the traditional country cottage to the more spacious and well-equipped modern bungalows and houses.
